welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kasagi, Japan! Known for its picturesque landscapes and rich cultural heritage, this charming city awaits your discovery. Embrace the local charm and immerse yourself in all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kansai International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Kansai International Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free Wi-Fi throughout the airport by connecting to the 'KIX Free Wi-Fi' network.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kobe Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Kobe Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require registration with a valid email address.
